TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UserTrackingLocationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> maintains two <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> specifies parameters used for matching activity status events and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> specifies parameters used to exclude activity status events from matching.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> locations) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a list of user locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection> is initialized to contain the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects specified in `locations`.

Docs.exception: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
